name: Blappy Fird
description:
Blappy Fird is one of my first games ever, and it's basically a cursed version of flappy bird. You can "flap" your way through endless amounts of bird pipes and try to get the highest score ever! Have fun playing my game.

Changelog

12/30/19 (Update 0.1): Original release

12/30/19 (Update 0.2): Bird pipe colliders turned into capsules to make collisions more accurate, some UI tweaks, added Windows support

12/31/19 (Update 0.3): Bird pipe colliders made even more accurate, delay after dying removed, some bug fixes
